meaning_str.bing:
n. 节；节日；节期；喜庆日
adj. 节日的
网络. 节庆；音乐节；喜庆的

节；节日；会演；庆祝活动；喜庆日；系列演出；节庆活动

sogou-kaoyan.n: 节日; 节庆[出现3次)];(音乐等的)会演; 节[出现0次)]

sogou-CET6.n: 节日[出现5次)];会演; 音乐节/会[出现3次)]

sogou-zhongkao.n: 节日[出现164次)];会演; 音乐节/会[出现51次)]

1.en: Tests will show whether the old gauges and boiler pressure points are up to federal standards to operate during the six-day festival.
1.cn: 试验将显示过去的标准尺寸和沸水压力点能否达到在六天庆典中进行操作的联邦标准。

2.en: In February or March, the Oscars are usually being held. In end of July, there's the Malibu Art Festival, which has a bit of everything.
2.cn: 在二月或三月，会举行奥斯卡颁奖典礼。在七月底，则是马利布艺术节，有很多可看的东西。

3.en: This is a pair of lovers fall into an important festival, on this day, couples don't have to be shy, enjoy belong to your "angel's kiss"
3.cn: 这是一个属于成双成对恋人的重要节日，在这一天，情侣们不必再害羞，享受属于你们的“天使之吻”

0.en: Chinese New Year is the most important festival in Chinese culture. It is a festival that requires the whole family to get together, so it gives us a concept of reunion.
0.cn: 中国新年在中国文化中是个最重要的节日。这是个全家必须团聚的节日，是个重聚的日子。

1.en: The festival continues the next day with the main event, perhaps the most epic water fight on earth.
1.cn: 节日第二天进入主题，或许这是世界上最声势浩大的水仗。

2.en: This is a new festival but based on a seventeen century tradition when fishermen carved lanterns from ice.
2.cn: 这是一个基于十七世纪传统的崭新节日，那时渔民曾用冰块雕刻灯笼。

3.en: You're right, he's a festival of humdrum chitchat.
3.cn: 你说得对，他果然在进行无聊的饭前寒暄。

4.en: We tour Cambulac in preparation for the Festival of the White Moon.
4.cn: 为庆贺白节，我们将巡游大都。

5.en: No, because we don't celebrate the ancient pagan festival of Saturnalia.
5.cn: 不，我们不庆祝古老的异教农神节。

6.en: All I said was that I want to go to the festival. Play for a little while only.
6.cn: 我不过就说了句我想去过节，我只想玩一小会儿。

7.en: So, I could take you to a Shakespeare festival. It's happening today and tomorrow.
7.cn: 我可以带你去一个莎士比亚庆典，就是今明两天。

8.en: You should go to that music festival thing with Haley. Do something fun. Learn to relax a...
8.cn: 你应该跟海莉一起去那个音乐节，找点乐子，学会放松…

9.en: Or, a guerilla art exhibit in dumbo? Or, hey, isn't the New York film festival still going on?
9.cn: 或者是一场边缘艺术展？还是？对了，纽约电影节还没结束吧？

10.en: I can't bring Alex to the festival because I am going for work to research new fashion trends.
10.cn: 我不能带艾丽克斯去音乐节，因为我是去工作，勘查最新流行趋势。

11.en: "Zayeed Shaheed is a guilty Muslim terrorist who bombed the Milwaukee Festival. Chubbysocks52."
11.cn: 扎耶德·沙希德是穆斯林恐怖分子，他在密尔沃基节引爆了炸弹 「肥袜52」。

12.en: Do we have enough to go to the festival? You're not smart. You never were. Mother and Father said so.
12.cn: 这些钱够我们去过节吗？你一点也不聪明，你一直都这样，父亲和母亲就这么说。

13.en: That was a lovely toast. Kudos. Thank you. Simultaneously, a festival of cloying cliche. You sicken me.
13.cn: 敬酒词说的不错呀，口头表扬一次。谢谢。与此同时，你的敬酒词也老套得让人反胃，你恶心死我了。

14.en: You wanna wander in the hall? Ooh, hey Ben, what if the Holiday Armadillo told you all about the festival of lights?
14.cn: 你想在走廊晃荡吗？班，佳节犰狳跟你说光之节的故事好吗？

15.en: Which do you think she'd prefer? Because I checked the Sheep and Wool Festival Web site, and there's only 8,000 tickets left.
15.cn: 你们觉得她最喜欢哪一个？因为我查过羊及羊毛节的官网，只剩8千张票了。

16.en: Well, Amy enjoys knitting her own sweaters, so I was thinking of getting her an all-expense-paid trip to the Wisconsin Sheep and Wool Festival.
16.cn: 艾米喜欢自己织毛衣，我在想自掏腰包赞助她去参加威斯康辛州羊及羊毛节。

17.en: Over the next week, artists will race to transform this plentiful local resource into a giant frozen wonderland, the Harbin ice and snow festival.
17.cn: 整个下一周，艺术家将竞相把这丰富的本地资源转化为巨大无匹的冰雪仙境：哈尔滨冰雪节。

18.en: But this icy river isn't just for extreme sports. All the building materials for the festival at Harbin are taken from this spot to create the city of ice.
18.cn: 除了极限运动外，这条冰河还有其它用处，哈尔滨冰雪节的所有建筑材料都从这里取用，冰城由此而来。
